column3: Script
column4: Required/Conditional

column3: Hi [Name] Welcome to Philer! I'm Clara, your virtual assistant. I'm here to guide you through the intake process for your real estate closing. I’ll be asking you a few questions about your transaction — this should take about 10 to 15 minutes. Before we begin, please make sure you're in a quiet place so we can talk without interruptions. If you have any questions along the way, just ask! And don't worry if you are not able to answer some questions. We will send you a summary of the information you will provide to us to your email and you will be able to adjust anything using the philer platform. Ready to get started?
column4: Required

column3: Great! Lets start!
Please tell me your first name. Feel free to spell it if you prefer
column4: Required

column3: Now your last name
column4: Required

column3: What is your date of birth?
column4: Required

column3: And what is your employment status? Full-time Employee, Part-time, Contract, Self-Employed or Unemployed?
column4: Required

column3: What is your Organization Name?
column4: Conditional If answer is NOT Unemployed

column3: And your role, or designation?
column4: Conditional If answer is NOT Unemployed

column3: Are you a first-time homebuyer? This means you never purchased any property anywhere in world.
column4: Required

column3: Are you a Canadian Citizen or Permanent Resident? Please specify
column4: Required

column3: Do you acknowledge that you are fully able to understand and make decisions on your own?
column4: Required

column3: Thank you for providing your details! Now I'd like to know more about the property and other closing details!
Are you Buying, Selling or Refinancing your property?
column5: THIS QUESTION CAN BE SKIPPED FOR THE MVP PHASE

column3: Is the property already built or it is a pre-construction purchase?
column4: Conditional if answer is Buying

column3: What is the type of the property you're closing on? Condo Apartment, Detached House, Semi-detached House, Freehold Townhouse, Condo Townhouse, Multiplex or other?
column4: Required

column3: What is your Closing Date?
column4: Required

column3: Do you know the property postal code? No problem if you don't have this information now
column4: Required

column3: Ok! Please tell me the property address, including the city
column4: Required

column3: Is this the address where you will be living after closing?
column4: Conditional if answer is Buying

column3: So, what is the address of the place you live or will be living after closing?
column4: Conditional if answer to "address where you will be living" is no

column3: And what it is the postal code?
column4: Conditional if answer to "address where you will be living" is no

column3: How do you intend to use the property you are acquiring? Primary Residence, Secondary Residence, Investment Property, Fix and Flip, Family Use or Other uses?
column4: Conditional if answer is Buying

column3: Lets Get Started! I see that you are purchasing a property on [Address + Postal Code], this property is a [Property Type], this property is [ready to live/ a precon] and you closing date is on [Closing Date] is this information right?
Ok, so what information would you like to correct?
column4: Conditional if answer to above is NO

column4: Required

column3: Thank you for providing your details! Now I'd like to know more about the property and other closing details!
Is [Address + Postal Code] the address where you will be living after closing?
column4: Conditional for Purchase Transactions

column3: So, what is the address of the place you live or will be living after closing?
column4: Conditional if answer to "address where you will be living" is no

column3: And what it is the city and postal code?
column4: Conditional if answer to "address where you will be living" is no

column3: Ok! Please tell me your spouse details
column4: Conditional if answer to Marital Status is Married or Common Law Partner

column3: Please tell me your spouse's first name. Feel free to spell it if you prefer

column3: Now your spouse's last name

column3: What is their date of birth?
column4: Conditional if answer to Marital Status is Married or Common Law Partner

column3: What is your spouse's Organization Name?
column4: Conditional if answer to Marital Status is Married or Common Law Partner + Conditional If answer is NOT Unemployed

column3: And their role, or designation?
column4: Conditional if answer to Marital Status is Married or Common Law Partner + Conditional If answer is NOT Unemployed

column3: Are they a first-time homebuyer? This means they never purchased any property anywhere in world.
column4: Conditional if answer to Marital Status is Married or Common Law Partner

column3: Are they a Canadian Citizen or Permanent Resident? Please specify

column3: Thank you for providing your spouse details! Are there any additional Applicants besides you and your spouse?
column4: Conditional if answer to Marital Status is Married or Common Law Partner

column3: Are there any other Applicants besides you?
column4: Conditional if answer to Marital Status is Single, Divorced or Separed

column3: >>>> runs Additional Applicants LOOP

column3: Are you signing by way of Power of Attorney?
column4: Required

column3: What is the Executor First Name?
column4: Conditional if Are you signing by way of Power of Attorney is YES

column3: What is the Executor Last Name?
column4: Conditional if Are you signing by way of Power of Attorney is YES

column3: How do you intend to hold the title? There are two options. Option one: Joint Tenancy - This is usually chosen by spouses as the interest in the property automatically passes to the surviving owner in case of the other owner's death - in this case all owners must have equal ownership shares . Option two is Tenants in common. In this case,  each owner's share goes to their estate/heirs upon death. Unlike in the first option, ownership can be unequal (e.g., one person owns 60%, the other 40%). What option you want to chose? Joint Tenancy or Tenants in Common?
column4: Conditional if is there more than one applicant

column3: What will be your percentage of ownership?
column4: Conditional if the answer is Tenants in Common

column3: What will be [Additional Applicant 1] share of ownership (Loop if there are more than 2 applicants)
column4: Conditional if the answer is Tenants in Common

column3: Would you know who your Mortgage Advisor is? If yes, please share their full name, Brokerage and your lender
column4: Required

column3: Please share the details of your real estate agent. What is their full-name and Real Estate Brokerage Company?
column4: Required

column3: If you are financing your home, it is likely that the lender will require you to have Home Insurance. Have you acquired Home Insurance yet?
column4: Required

column3: Please share more details of the home insurance company and their advisor.
column4: Conditional if answer to home insurance is yes

column3: We've completed your Intake! We will send you an email with the summary of the information you provided to us shortly. Don't worry if there are typos or any missing information. You will be able to adjust anything on the Philer Platform - we will also provide you with instructions to access it. Finally, we will ask you to send two pieces of ID and any other required documents you haven't sent them to us already. Everything you need to know will be in the email we are sending shortly. Thank you for chosing Philer for your real estate closing! have a good day!
